title: Select Budget Committee Public Hearing 11/8/22
description: Agenda:Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; The Select Budget Committee will conduct a public hearing to solicit public comment on: (1) the Citys 2023 General Revenue Sources, including a possible property tax levy increase; and (2) the Mayors 2023 and 2024 Proposed Budgets and 2023-2028 Capital Improvement Program.
